named-native-query.name: TotalOcorrencias.PorLocal
named-native-query.query:
SELECT DISTINCT o.local_ocorrencia as local, (SELECT count(codigo) FROM ocorrencia WHERE local_ocorrencia like (o.local_ocorrencia)) as ocorrencias FROM ocorrencia o ORDER BY ocorrencias DESC
LIMIT 0 , 5;

named-native-query.name: TotalOcorrencias.PorUsuario
named-native-query.query:
SELECT DISTINCT u.email as usuario, (SELECT COUNT(oc.codigo) FROM ocorrencia oc WHERE oc.codigo_usuario = u.codigo) as ocorrencias FROM ocorrencia o INNER JOIN usuario u ON u.codigo = o.codigo_usuario ORDER BY ocorrencias DESC
LIMIT 0 , 5;

named-native-query.name: TotalOcorrencias.PorAluno
named-native-query.query:
SELECT DISTINCT a.nome as aluno, (SELECT COUNT(oc.codigo) FROM ocorrencia oc WHERE oc.codigo_aluno = a.codigo) as ocorrencias FROM ocorrencia o INNER JOIN aluno a ON a.codigo = o.codigo_aluno ORDER BY ocorrencias DESC
LIMIT 0 , 5;
